I've got a serious problem with my 360 now, I tried to run it with my xkey360, and the xbox asked for an update. I clicked update, and then i got an error message that it couldn't read the update from the disc. The status code i got with this error is: 397F - 3CD6 - 2800 - 0f00 - C000 - 0034. This error keeps coming up now every time I turn on my xbox. If anyone has a solution to this, thank you very much in advance!

MAN!! It's working for me after that fuking update, the last time I did one, it fuked my system up, I was lucky I lived in Korea, but now am back in the U.S. so I have to be 100% careful. I'd hate to send my xbox to my friend and have to pay him extra money just to re mod it.  Does anyone know if Xbox is doing a firmware update later on?????

@Ryuman13

 Reset XBOX 360 Failed System Updates

    With the console off, press and hold the sync up button.


    While holding the sync button press the power button to turn on the console


    Continue to hold the sync button until the Console has booted up completely.


    During the boot process the console should clear any failed updates, allowing you to use it normally.
@dududus, I actually fixed it a different way, but still many thanks for answering :) Will remember it for a next time
